quran-radio.title: Quran Radio
quran-radio.description: Listen to QuranRadio - stream Quran without ads

search-bar.title: Search Bar
search-bar.description: Find the verses, surahs, keywords, juz and topics you are looking for by utilizing our search bar

voice-search.title: Voice search (tarteel)
voice-search.description: Tap the mic icon and recite the verse you are searching for. Quick Tip! To discover where someone is reciting (Eg. Taraweeh prayers), tap the mic icon. After one or two verses are detected, press stop to find the location

theme.title: Read Quran in Light, Sepia, or Dark Mode
theme.description: Pick your favorite look—Light, Sepia, or Dark mode—for a comfortable and personalized Quran reading experience.

font-style.title: Choose your preferred reading script
font-style.description: Options include Uthmani - King Fahad Complex v1, Uthmani - King Fahad Complex v2, Uthmani QPC Hafs, indopak 15 lines, indopak 16 lines

font-size.title: Font Size
font-size.description: Customize your Quran reading with easy-to-adjust font sizes for a comfortable reading experience

wbw-translation.title: Read word-by-word translation
wbw-translation.description: View the meaning of individual words while you read or listen to the Quran to help you enhance your Quranic vocabulary

wbw-transliteration.title: Read word-by-word transliteration
wbw-transliteration.description: View the transliteration of every word to help you on your Quran reading journey

wbw-audio.title: Listen to word-by-word translation by clicking on word
wbw-audio.description: Select this option to listen to every word individually by simply clicking on the word!

inline-wbw.title: Display word-by-word translation in-line (underneath the word) or display tooltip
inline-wbw.description: View the translation of every word in line (underneath the word) or in a bubble above the word while listening to the Quran

translations.title: Translations
translations.description: Choose from a variety of translations in multiple languages. Tip: Compare translations by selecting multiple options

surah-info.title: Read surah info
surah-info.description: Get insights about each Surah conveniently located at the beginning of every surah

select-reciter.title: Select from a variety of reciters to listen to
select-reciter.description: Personalize your listening experience by selecting a reciter you enjoy listening to most!

ayah-tafsir.title: Read tafsir at the ayah level
ayah-tafsir.description: Explore Tafsir at the ayah level, offering detailed insights to enhance your understanding as you read. (Tafsir may be grouped for multiple verses when appropriate)

ayah-reflection.title: Read reflections at the ayah level
ayah-reflection.description: Read reflections (tadabbur) from scholars, students of knowledge, and everyday people to help you develop a more personal connection with the Quran

3-dot-menu.title: 3 dot menu
3-dot-menu.description: Click the 3 dot menu to discover options for copying, bookmarking, and repeating verses. Discover a variety of options to repeat verses

reading-view.title: Reading mode
reading-view.description: View Quran in reading mushaf mode

login.title: Log in
login.description: Log in and save settings across devices and gain access to additional features.

streak.title: Keep track of reading streaks & reading plans
streak.description: Set personalized reading goals, track your progress, and build a consistent Quranic reading habit with our Reading Streaks and Plans feature.

reading-sessions.title: View reading history
reading-sessions.description: Easily review your Quranic journey with a glance at your personalized reading history, keeping track of the verses you've explored on Quran.com.
